data.text:
very nice and kind staff , 

alfred and sherly are very helpfull and friendly at the reception .

can only recommend it !

good food good location

top room service and shuttle bus.

not far from downtown dubai.

enjoy your stay and the pool .
………………..
data.title: Revier Hotel Dubai

data.text: Awesome stay, location wise excellent....the service here is exceptional, the staff are very friendly...any requirement for taxi, any additional amenities were promptly addressed.....I would also like to mention Sherly, Bibek and Houda who were extremely helpful and provided great service throughout our stay...rooms are clean, great buffet spread for breakfast...will definitely recommend this place to my family and friends for their next stay.
data.title: Awesome stay

data.text: Excellent hotel and very friendly staff. Many thanks to Elvira and Bibek for making my stay very pleasant! Interiors are very well done and provide a contemporary and yet cozy environment.  Services are good and on par with best hotels I’ve stayed at in the region
data.title: Great location and friendly staff!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Grüezi 98robertob,
Warmest greetings from Revier Dubai.
Thank you for sharing your review following your recent stay with us. It is with delight to know that we were able to make your stay with us a memorable experience. Thank you for highlighting our colleagues ‘exceptional service. Please rest assured that we have shared your flattering comments with the team, particularly to Elvira and Bibek.
We look forward to welcoming you back with us for another ‘Treasured Time.’ 
Yours sincerely, 
Revier Dubai Management
owner_response.author: Revier Dubai

data.text:
The worst hotel and worst management ever in my life ..

The bad smell in the lobby
Fire alarm due to the presence of a person suffering from diabetes
Rooms with noises during sleep
Bathroom showers are bad

The hotel prices are exaggerated for this hotel and the pictures on Booking are misleading. They are not the same as the reality and the rooms are very small for a new hotel and it does not deserve a star.
data.title: The worst hotel ever

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Grüezi F7649JEahmedb,
Thank you for sharing your review following your recent stay with Revier Dubai.
We are deeply sorry to read that your stay fell significantly short of your expectations, and you encountered several issues that impacted your overall impression of our hotel. We would like to apologize for the inconvenience you have had with the shower in your room. Please rest assured that we have addressed your comment to our Engineering Team for corrective measure.  We apologize for any inconvenience caused by the fire alarm going off. The safety and well-being of our guests are our top priorities, and occasionally, these alarms are triggered in an emergency. Rest assured, our team is always working to safety and well-being. Therefore, we would like to ask for your understanding in this regard.We sincerely hope that this isolated experience will not deter you from visiting us again.   
Meanwhile, we look forward to welcoming you back at Revier Dubai, trusting that we could provide you with the excellent service that you truly deserve.
Yours sincerely,
Revier Dubai Management
owner_response.author: Revier Dubai

data.text: The staff were great, Kismat, Deshan ans Elvira were kind and nice. They helped me with me with almost everything on my trip. Highly recommend this place. If you wanna use the pool, the vibe is graet and the location is in the heart of the Dubai.
data.title: Great Adventure!
